description: North Korea has reportedly sent balloons carrying trash and excrement into South Korea. NPR's Scott Simon has details — smelly and otherwise — on how both countries have used balloons over the years.
title: Opinion: It's a bird, it's a plane, no, it's trash and tunes in the air

description: Once the federal money expires, one Tulsa organization estimates its after-school program offerings will shrink from 450 to just 75. That's unless they can find outside funding.
title: Pandemic aid for schools is ending soon. Many after-school programs may go with it

description: Janine and Gregory. Jim and Pam. Sydney and Carmy? Critic Aisha Harris, a self-described will-they-won't-they grinch, explores our obsession with simmering sexual tension ... even when there is none.
title: Will they? Won't they? And ... why do we care?

description: A new lab analysis conducted for NPR by Arizona State University data scientists shows that OpenAI's "Sky" voice is more similar to Johannsson's than hundreds of others actors analyzed.
title: Voice analysis shows striking similarity between Scarlett Johansson and ChatGPT
